nodes.text: Waydurk was a Mimbanese who joined Enfys Nest's Cloud-Riders during the the Imperial Era. Waydurk participated during the skirmish on Savareen and made use of a Mimbanese blaster.
Waydurk first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was later identified in the Star Wars: Card Trader app. Waydurk was portrayed in the film by Harley Durst.[source?]
